item.title: @elonmusk: Wokeism & victimhood ideology in one brutal experiment: Women had fake facial scars applied for job ...
item.description: Wokeism & victimhood ideology in one brutal experiment: Women had fake facial scars applied for job interviews. They saw the scars in the mirror. Researchers secretly removed them before the interview. Women believed they were disfigured‚Ä¶ and reported MASSIVE discrimination ‚Äî interviewers "referencing" scars that didn't exist. 57-sec clip ‚Äî Konstantin Kisin exposes how victim mindset creates its own reality üëá If you're constantly told you're oppressed, you'll start seeing it everywhere. Your take: Self-fulfilling prophecy or something deeper?

item.title: @elonmusk: This wasn't murder. Renee's death in Minneapolis is tragic. But see it for what it is, not what you ...
item.description: This wasn't murder. Renee's death in Minneapolis is tragic. But see it for what it is, not what you want it to be. You can hate ICE. But blocking officers then speeding off in a 2-ton vehicle with people at your bumper is irrational. She rolled the dice. Sadly, she died.

item.title: @elonmusk: My jaw dropped watching this Journalist visited 3 locations for a Somalian owned NGO healthcare comp...
item.description: My jaw dropped watching this Journalist visited 3 locations for a Somalian owned NGO healthcare company The offices are empty, it‚Äôs clear nobody is at the locations They got $14 million dollars last year and a total of $42 MILLION over the past few years Again, $42 MLLION ‚ÄúLegitimately not here. What's shocking to me is that this is the third office that's listed for the Somalian Education Resource Center. They got 14 million dollars just this year There's nothing in there and it looks empty from what the guys are telling me. But where did the $14 million dollars go? This is taxpayer funding. We deserve answers.‚Äù ‚Äú$14 million in a building that smells like weed ‚Äî Where is the money? Because this, the organization is supposedly 42 million dollars over the past few years in taxpayer funding, and we have no access and we have no idea where it is.‚Äù

item.title: @elonmusk: That is exactly what they have been doing and it is sure to result in a one-party state, like Califo...
item.description: That is exactly what they have been doing and it is sure to result in a one-party state, like California, but far worse. What holds back California, which is already a one-party supermajority state, from being far worse is that people can move to other states without leaving America. What do you think will happen when there is no escape?
